arStrings.szText: {c_important}Bone Spear's{/c} primary attack makes enemies hit beyond the first {c_important}{u}Vulnerable{/u}{/c} for {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|1|]{/c} seconds. Bone Shards from {c_important}Bone Spear{/c} deal {c_random}[(Affix."Static Value 0" * (Affix_Value_1 - 1.5)) + Affix."Static Value 1"|%|]{/c} bonus damage to {c_important}{u}Vulnerable{/u}{/c} enemies and pierce them.
